posts.title: Add tags for solutions
posts.content: Easier to search for solutions based on a specific stack.

posts.title: Add a dark theme option
posts.content: It would help people with light sensitivities and who prefer dark mode.

posts.title: Q&A within the challenge hubs
posts.content: Challenge-specific Q&A would make for easy reference.

posts.title: Add image/video upload to feedback
posts.content: Images and screencasts can enhance comments on solutions.
